title: How to Get Tickets to Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s 2025 Tour
description: Lamar and SZA will join forces for a 19-date stadium tour in 2025. Learn how to get tickets here. How to Get Tickets to Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s 2025 Tour Paolo Ragusa
author: Paolo Ragusa
excerpt: Kendrick Lamar and SZA are teaming up for the 2025 "Grand National Tour." Learn how to get tickets and see the full list of dates here.
text: Kendrick Lamar and SZA are teaming up for a 2025 co-headlining run titled the “Grand National Tour.” The 19-date North American tour will hit stadiums throughout April, May, and June, 2025. Get Kendrick Lamar and SZA Tickets Here Scroll below for more details, including how to get tickets, and see the full list of Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s tour dates. How Can I Buy Tickets to Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s “Grand National Tour”? Tickets for Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s co-headlining “Grand National Tour” will go on-sale first via a Cash App Visa Card pre-sale. Cash App cardholders will be able to access the pre-sale beginning on Wednesday, December 4th at 10:00 a.m. local time; cardholders can use the first nine digits of their Cash App cards to access tickets. Cash App cardholders will also receive a 20% instant discount on all official Grand National Tour merch purchased at the venue with their Cash App Card. Learn more about the pre-sale here. Tickets will go on-sale for the general public on Friday, December 6th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. Once tickets are on-sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out concerts via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. What Is Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s “Grand National Tour”? Kendrick Lamar and SZA aren’t just longtime collaborators or previous label mates, they’re good friends! They even toured together before for the sprawling 2018 outing “The Champions Tour,” which featured Lamar and SZA playing sets alongside fellow Top Dog Entertainment artists ScHoolboy Q, Jay Rock, Ab-Soul, and more. Their 2025 “Grand National” stadium tour arrives in support of Lamar’s recent surprise album GNX; not only does the project feature SZA on two tracks, we named it as one of the best albums of 2024. Plus, Lamar garnered a massive hit single this year with “Not Like Us,” and will ring in the new year with a major performance at the Super Bowl LIX Halftime Show in February. SZA, meanwhile, graced 2024 with “Saturn,” a single we named as one of the best songs of the year so far and a preview for her upcoming, to-be-announced third album Lana. The tour is presented by presented by Lamar’s new label and creative project pgLang, SZA’s label Top Dawg Entertainment, and Live Nation. The two hip-hop and R&B stalwarts will join forces for a 19-date stadium tour throughout the US (as well as one sole date in Toronto, Canada). They’ll begin the run on April 19th in Minneapolis, and will continue on with shows in Houston, Atlanta, Charlotte, Philadelphia, East Rutherford, Seattle, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Chicago, Detroit, and more. The tour concludes with a show at Washington D.C.’s Northwest Stadium on June 18th. See the full list of tour dates below. Who Is Opening for Kendrick Lamar and SZA on Their “Grand National Tour”? No openers have been announced yet for Lamar and SZA’s 2025 tour, but we’ll update this post as soon as they are confirmed. What Are Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s 2025 Tour Dates? See the full list of Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s upcoming tour dates below, and grab your tickets here. Kendrick Lamar and SZA 2025 Tour Dates: 04/19 — Minneapolis, MN @ U.S. Bank Stadium 04/23 — Houston, TX @ NRG Stadium 04/26 — Arlington, TX @ AT&T Stadium 04/29 — Atlanta, GA @ Mercedes Benz Stadium 05/03 — Charlotte, NC @ Bank of America Stadium 05/05 — Philadelphia, PA @ Lincoln Financial Field 05/08 — East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium 05/09 — East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium 05/12 — Foxborough, MA @ Gillette Stadium 05/17 — Seattle, WA @ Lumen Field 05/21 — Los Angeles, CA @ SoFi Stadium 05/23 — Los Angeles, CA @ SoFi Stadium 05/27 — Glendale, AZ @ State Farm Stadium 05/29 — San Francisco, CA @ Oracle Park 05/31 — Las Vegas, NV @ Allegiant Stadium 06/04 — St. Louis, MO @ The Dome at America’s Center 06/06 — Chicago, IL @ Soldier Field 06/10 — Detroit, MI @ Ford Field 06/12 — Toronto, ON @ Rogers Centre 06/16 — Hershey, PA @ Hersheypark Stadium 06/18 — Washington, DC @ Northwest StadiumKendrick Lamar and SZA, photo by Andre D. Wagner
html:
Kendrick Lamar and SZA are teaming up for a 2025 co-headlining run titled the “Grand National Tour.”

The 19-date North American tour will hit stadiums throughout April, May, and June, 2025.

Get Kendrick Lamar and SZA Tickets Here

Scroll below for more details, including how to get tickets, and see the full list of Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s tour dates.

How Can I Buy Tickets to Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s “Grand National Tour”?

Tickets for Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s co-headlining “Grand National Tour” will go on-sale first via a Cash App Visa Card pre-sale. Cash App cardholders will be able to access the pre-sale beginning on Wednesday, December 4th at 10:00 a.m. local time; cardholders can use the first nine digits of their Cash App cards to access tickets. Cash App cardholders will also receive a 20% instant discount on all official Grand National Tour merch purchased at the venue with their Cash App Card. Learn more about the pre-sale here.

Tickets will go on-sale for the general public on Friday, December 6th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

Once tickets are on-sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out concerts via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

What Is Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s “Grand National Tour”?

Kendrick Lamar and SZA aren’t just longtime collaborators or previous label mates, they’re good friends! They even toured together before for the sprawling 2018 outing “The Champions Tour,” which featured Lamar and SZA playing sets alongside fellow Top Dog Entertainment artists ScHoolboy Q, Jay Rock, Ab-Soul, and more.

Their 2025 “Grand National” stadium tour arrives in support of Lamar’s recent surprise album GNX; not only does the project feature SZA on two tracks, we named it as one of the best albums of 2024. Plus, Lamar garnered a massive hit single this year with “Not Like Us,” and will ring in the new year with a major performance at the Super Bowl LIX Halftime Show in February.

SZA, meanwhile, graced 2024 with “Saturn,” a single we named as one of the best songs of the year so far and a preview for her upcoming, to-be-announced third album Lana. The tour is presented by presented by Lamar’s new label and creative project pgLang, SZA’s label Top Dawg Entertainment, and Live Nation.

The two hip-hop and R&B stalwarts will join forces for a 19-date stadium tour throughout the US (as well as one sole date in Toronto, Canada). They’ll begin the run on April 19th in Minneapolis, and will continue on with shows in Houston, Atlanta, Charlotte, Philadelphia, East Rutherford, Seattle, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Chicago, Detroit, and more. The tour concludes with a show at Washington D.C.’s Northwest Stadium on June 18th. See the full list of tour dates below.

Who Is Opening for Kendrick Lamar and SZA on Their “Grand National Tour”?

No openers have been announced yet for Lamar and SZA’s 2025 tour, but we’ll update this post as soon as they are confirmed.

What Are Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s 2025 Tour Dates?

See the full list of Kendrick Lamar and SZA’s upcoming tour dates below, and grab your tickets here.

Kendrick Lamar and SZA 2025 Tour Dates:
04/19 — Minneapolis, MN @ U.S. Bank Stadium
04/23 — Houston, TX @ NRG Stadium
04/26 — Arlington, TX @ AT&T Stadium
04/29 — Atlanta, GA @ Mercedes Benz Stadium
05/03 — Charlotte, NC @ Bank of America Stadium
05/05 — Philadelphia, PA @ Lincoln Financial Field
05/08 — East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium
05/09 — East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium
05/12 — Foxborough, MA @ Gillette Stadium
05/17 — Seattle, WA @ Lumen Field
05/21 — Los Angeles, CA @ SoFi Stadium
05/23 — Los Angeles, CA @ SoFi Stadium
05/27 — Glendale, AZ @ State Farm Stadium
05/29 — San Francisco, CA @ Oracle Park
05/31 — Las Vegas, NV @ Allegiant Stadium
06/04 — St. Louis, MO @ The Dome at America’s Center
06/06 — Chicago, IL @ Soldier Field
06/10 — Detroit, MI @ Ford Field
06/12 — Toronto, ON @ Rogers Centre
06/16 — Hershey, PA @ Hersheypark Stadium
06/18 — Washington, DC @ Northwest Stadium

Kendrick Lamar and SZA, photo by Andre D. Wagner
